replies.body:
Hello riot is it possible that you could put an option in the in game settings that you can use the old hub
 {{champion:161}} {{summoner:13}} {{item:3151}}
Logged in just to upvote this.
me too I would prefer the old one
Yeah very true, i really dont like the new H.U.D. It would be great if you could go back to the old HUD
great idea
I think it would just be a nuisance to have to learn where everything is on the new hud, not only that it kinda blocks up you view a little. So having an option to change back would be great.
This is a good idea please do this riot like you did with the music {{champion:432}}
the music was a bad idea the old was good

Riot this is a great idea. I would personally not mind having to have a longer update. but i would please like that option.
"Hello riot is it possible that you could put an option in the in game settings that you can use the old hub"
Yes I agree with this. They should totally do that!!!{{champion:35}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:115}}
{{item:2004}} NEED TO SEE TEAMMATES MANA!{{item:2004}}

Instead of purely changing the UI make it so it has customization (e.g rift) so people can make it however they want since some people will like some things about it but not others i just think it would make the game a whole lot better with more customization.
can i change the how big the thing is to lvl up my abilities, so i dont miss them in battle.
you know you can hold ctrl and press the ability key you want to level right?
Bind your level up abilities to F1, F2, F3, F4. On some keyboards, the F keys are grouped into fours, so you'll never miss it
OMG I wanna downvote this so much more.
I don't understand why, using ctrl + abiltiy key to level up isnt something you HAVE to do, just like smartcasting. It's all preference

it is all preference yes but you use "smartcast" a few times and go back to normal cast, like binding your quick level up i didnt know you could do that would make it more quicker and usefull i guess but yeh still billions to learn we have haha
ummm..Can u make the loading game screen chatable?? Because sometime the game take too long to load, so I think if we can start chatting while loading the game this will be great!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Is there a button to see if your team is a bunch of feeders??
TAB
WHERES THE TEAMS MANA.. THATS SO IMPORTANT
i dont know how they missed that.
I love the aesthetic. It looks slick and very efficient. Very happy with being able to see enemy death timers without tabbing too.
i dint think they would do that but they did so i like it.
I like it, except for the border around the map. I feel like it makes it too big, and obscures too much of that corner.{{summoner:2}}
Uhm, if you find it too big then just down size it in the settings. I think personally its alright. ^_^
it's not that bad, atm you should be playing with your map on the largest setting anyway so you can stuff so this change doesnt really effect much
Maybe it'll be a good idea to have indicators for your teammates summoners?
Let us edit the layout of the UI ourselves.
you guys all don't like it because your so used to the other one

i dont like the new HUD i ENJOY the one we have now, Plz make it optional to change them in game 
{{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:62}}
I got a question. Can I NOT have this new HUD? Looks f**king terrible.
yeah i agree got to say the riot people are ruining this for us -.- i reckon we should sign a petition saying not to vote for the new HUD you reckon?
you can jump change the position of the minimap by putting it on the left leaving the bottom right open
if we want to keep the old way, can we please have a classic setting or something?

This new HUD update looks amazing! cant wait until it goes live. i especially love how you can drag around the champs in tab this would make looking at who is winning in lane a whole lot easier! Thanks Riot!
Can we at least have the option to use the old one?

Wow this looks amazing! It looks clean, simple and all in one place. Please bring this out, It will help new players alot and old players will get used to this look. I really like the minimap. People are complaining about top lane ganks not being seen, constant warding and predicting will stop that (stop blaming no wards on Supp and Jungler, you need to ward too), also a constant eye on the minimap will help. This looks excellent. Thank you Riot.
Whens it gonna be released?
ummm..Can u make the loading game screen chatable?? Because sometime the game take too long to load, so I think if we can start chatting while loading the game this will be great!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I think this might be another change to make purple side a lot easier
Is there a way where i can drag my teams scores into the FEED section?
DAT {{champion:22}} GOLD DOE

For the people that dislike this update, or any previous update, you can remove your skins and UI and replace it with any of the previous patch UIs. You can even customize champion skins, just look around on google. I personally use a hub from 2009 for higher FPS since I don't have a reliable GFC. There's a tutorial on YouTube, but I can't find it, this is also a great site to customize with http://leaguecraft.com.
I also want to say that this if bloody perfect, don't change the position of everything or what stats are shown where, it all works so smoothly and will help with gameplay.
